title: How is Nifty Q2 Report Card looking?
text:
For , 22 companies have declared their Q2 FY 19-20 numbers till 23rd Oct 2019. Below table shows brief analysis of how those numbers stand on PAT (Profit After Taxes) and PAT Margins basis.

Nifty Q2 Report Card

Of 22 companies, only 5 Companies saw decline in their profit margins since Dec 18 quarter. Of which Wipro (NS: ) and HCL Tech saw some improvement in their margins since last quarter.

Only 2 companies, Larsen & Toubro (NS: ) and Hindustan Unilever (NS: ) saw margins expansion QoQ for each of the last 4 quarters.

On Profit after Taxes front, for 4 Companies, Profits declined since Dec 18 quarter and for 8 companies Profits declined on QoQ basis.

Hindustan Unilever (NS: ) Limited is the only company where profits as well as profit margins grew consistently for 4 consecutive quarters.

Overall its been a decent quarter for most of these companies on the performance basis.
description: Shares Analysis by Jamnadas Virji Advisory covering: Nifty 50, Hindustan Unilever Ltd., Larsen & Toubro Ltd, Wipro Ltd. Read Jamnadas Virji Advisory's latest article on Investing.com India.
